title: Digital Marketing Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at MAP International (Atlanta, GA) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview lasted for 30 minutes with Lindsey, and she asked open-ended questions. I felt very welcomed in the interview, and she gave me time to speak about my skills and ask questions about MAP and the position.
Interview Questions: What is your background in digital marketing?

title: Marketing Operations Manager Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at MAP International (Lakeland, FL) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: Though I decided on a different route for my next role, my experience interviewing with MAP International was very professional and positive. They accommodated my schedule and communicated well throughout the process. Though I withdrew my application, they called to follow up and left the door open for potential opportunities in the future.
Interview Questions: What interested you about this role?

title: Creative Marketing Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at MAP International (Atlanta, GA) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very professional and responsive. They were communicative, friendly, and asked well thought-out questions. I felt they were engaged from start to finish and definitely made me feel comfortable with the environment / team.
